entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who has written notes on the confederation. The text states 'Hermione’s notes on the confedera- tion had gone on for pages and pages.'

entities.name: france
entities.description: France is mentioned as the location where the confederation first met. The text states 'The confederation had met for the first time in France'.

entities.name: liechtenstein
entities.description: Liechtenstein is mentioned as a location from which nobody wanted to attend the confederation. The text states 'And nobody from Liechtenstei n had wanted to come.'

entities.name: department of mysteries
entities.description: The Department of Mysteries is mentioned as a place where the protagonist is walking. The text states 'He was walking along the cool, dark corridor to the Department of Mysteries again'.

relationships.description: Hermione has written notes on the confederation. The text states 'Hermione’s notes on the confedera- tion had gone on for pages and pages.'
The confederation first met in France. The text states 'The confederation had met for the first time in France'.
Goblins tried to attend the confederation but were ousted. The text states 'Goblins had tried to attend and been ousted.'
Nobody from Liechtenstein wanted to attend the confederation. The text states 'And nobody from Liechtenstei n had wanted to come.'
The protagonist is walking to the Department of Mysteries. The text states 'He was walking along the cool, dark corridor to the Department of Mysteries again'.
